name: Bestiary: The Tale of The Seven Stars
name_original: Bestiary: The Tale of The Seven Stars
description:
Yselion is a large continent, brimming with life and mysteries. Its sky features 6 bright stars and a blueish moon, which were adored by an ancient civilization, long buried in the ground thousands of years ago. Dangerous Beasts roam the earth, skies and seas, they possess power unlike any seen in the rest of the world.

You, either a traveler or a local, have recently lost all your loved ones and belongings after New Areus was attacked by a giant Beast once more. You have no choice but to look for work, the town's factions  seem to be looking for volunteers to explore some ruins. It could be dangerous but you've got nothing else to lose.

Bestiary is a monster raising and taming game centered around exploration. While trying to merge both vanilla monster rpg mechanics may sound really difficult to implement, this is more posible for an indie game.

Features:

  • Tame and raise monsters from their hatchling stage into Adulthood. Train them to unlock their potential or breed them to create the perfect Beast.
  • Explore a vast world full of secrets by foot or Ride your partners.
  • Battle alongside your partner for survival or Face off against other tamers in 1v1 combat. Sideview animated battles.
  • Beasts grow, eat, get injured or ill and eventually pass away. Feed your beasts to keep them fit and control their temper in battle. Each species has their own life cycle.

The complete game will feature 77 species of Beasts and 4 Character Classes to play with.

Demo v0.2.
